attributes.action: Begin exploring new ways of connecting our communities of homeless.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government or Parliament to do this because I believe the UK can create an enduring culture of care, because us, as it’s citizens, we care. We care about supporting the well-being of others and we want to see more ways in which homeless people can seize an opportunity to not only better themselves but also our communities in the process.
attributes.background: Begin exploring ways in which this government can implement new coordinated initiates to engage with the homeless community so that they can generate points from “support work” which aids communities.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do, or what you mean when you refer to generating "points".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
